Module: jcontroller/subcontrollers/listenerController

Listner Controller Module - listener function to add listeners to elements
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_type string type of listener to be added
_handler function handler function specified
_propagating Boolean whether the event should be propagated
Source:
  • jcontroller/subcontrollers/listenerController.js, line 26
Returns:
listener object to allow the binding of listeners to objects
